link.title: Meals being offered during closure - UPDATE - Laker School District - Elkton – Pigeon – Bay Port

meta.content: Meals being offered during closure - UPDATE - Laker School District - Elkton – Pigeon – Bay Port

Attention Laker Families: Each week until the end of the school year June 5, there will be a single curbside food distribution on Wednesdays from 10 a.m. to noon at the east doors of the high school. We will be providing breakfast and lunch for 7 days! Please contact Cinamon at cmarker@lakerschools.org with any questions…
Laker School District - Elkton – Pigeon – Bay Port

div.h1: Meals being offered during closure – UPDATE

article.class: post-10736 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail category-news category-15 description-off

div.p: Attention Laker Families: Each week until the end of the school year June 5, there will be a single curbside food distribution on Wednesdays from 10 a.m. to noon at the east doors of the high school. We will be providing breakfast and lunch for 7 days! Please contact Cinamon at cmarker@lakerschools.org with any questions or to sign up for meals.

Again, this is for ALL Laker students, not just those who qualify for free or reduced lunches. It will be grab-n-go, not dine-in, so just plan to arrive during the designated times to pick up your food!
It is our privilege to help our community during this challenging time.
